```
version: '2.4'
services:
  db:
    image: postgres
  my_app:
    image: "eugen/test-app:latest"
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
```

```
$ docker-compose pull

Pulling my_app ... done
```

```
$ docker-compose pull my_app
```

```
version: '2.4'
services:
  db:
    image: postgres
  my_app:
    build: ./test-app
    ports:
      - "8080:8080"
```

```
FROM openjdk:11
COPY target/test-app-0.0.1-SNAPSHOT.jar app.jar
ENTRYPOINT ["java","-jar","/app.jar"]
```
